parser

Class SimpleDOLRule

  • java.lang.Object
    • parser.SimpleDOLRule
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Rule

    public class SimpleDOLRule
extends java.lang.Object
implements Rule
    Represent a rule for a determinist context-free L-system, where preExpr contains only one symbol.
    Author:
    xinouch
